channel.title: CVE Feed for WisdomGarden -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WisdomGarden -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-41356|2024-10-14T03:37:24.477Z -- wisdomgarden -- tronclass%20ilearn
item.description: NCSIST ManageEngine Mobile Device Manager(MDM) APP's special function has a path traversal vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and read arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2024-6738|2024-07-24T20:13:14.207Z -- wisdomgarden -- tronclass
item.description: The tumbnail API of Tronclass from WisdomGarden lacks proper access control, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to obtain certain specific files by modifying the URL.

item.title: CVE-2024-6738|2024-07-15T02:50:39.639Z -- wisdomgarden -- tronclass
item.description: The tumbnail API of Tronclass from WisdomGarden lacks proper access control, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to obtain certain specific files by modifying the URL.
